title: Documentation
description: Gives a json representation of documentation for specified endpoint

endpoint.desc: Endpoint you want documentation for, matches route with stripped slashes

title: Thumbnail
description: Used to get a thumbnail of the uploaded image, maintains aspect ratio, and will default to a max width or height of 200px (whichever is larger).

size.desc: Size (in pixels) of largest edge of image to return

title: Gaussian Blur
description: Applies a gaussian blur to the image with a specified radius (defaults to 2)

radius.desc: Severity of blur to apply in pixels

title: Box Blur
description: Applies a box blur to the image with a specified radius (defaults to 10)

radius.desc: Severity of blur to apply in pixels

title: Unsharp Mask
description: Applies an unsharp mask to the image

radius.desc: Size of edges to be enhanced

title: Offset
description: Offsets the pixels in an image by the given offset amount

offsetX.desc: Offset for x axis (in pixels), defaults to 20px

offsetY.desc: Offset for y axis (in pixels), defaults to offsetX

center.desc: Boolean flag to use width/2 and height/2 for offsets
